name: D6++ Modern
instructions: Designed for the D6++ Modern RPG system.
description:

- Streamlined layout optimized for clarity and speed during play.
- Auto-calculations for skills, wounds, and modifiers to keep the action flowing.
- Pre-built roll buttons for all major actionsâ€”just click and play.
- Training mode and background selection built directly into the sheet.
- Customizable attributes, weapons, and gear for player characters, and NPCs.

- Flexible sheet types: Player Character, Vehicles, Beasts, Major NPC, Standard NPC, and Quick NPC
